ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank the Marcus Foundation (NCT02176317) for their financial support, the children who participated and their families, and the following staff members: Todd Calnan, Crystal Chiang, Kendyl Cole, Michelle Perry, Mallory Harris, Jennifer Newman, Katherine S. Davlantis, Elizabeth Paisley, Charlotte Stoute, and Elizabeth Sturdivant.
